techmeme.title: Jensen Huang says "I don't think I changed" Trump's mind on the US' China export rules, and "it's my job to inform the president about what I know very well" (New York Times)
Sources: OpenAI is aiming to add a checkout system into ChatGPT, to ensure users complete transactions within the platform, with merchants paying a commission (Financial Times)
Saudi startup Lucidya, which develops customer experience software, raised a $30M Series B led by Impact46, marking the largest AI funding round in the kingdom (Yassmin Jabri/Bloomberg)
ASML CEO Christophe Fouquet says "while we still prepare for growth in 2026, we cannot confirm it", after Trump threatened 30% EU tariffs; ASML falls 10%+ (Mauro Orru/Wall Street Journal)
HPE unveils several business changes, including forming a strategy committee and appointing a new board member, as it agrees to work with Elliott to boost value (Molly Schuetz/Bloomberg)
